Constants¶

Contains several constants that will be used inside the application

Constants.PROJECT_NAME¶

The name of the project. Will be used for the name of the main application window.

Constants.LOG_WINDOW_NAME¶

The name of the logs window.

Constants.MAIN_WINDOW_GEOMETRY¶

The size of the main application window.

Constants.LOG_WINDOW_GEOMETRY¶

The size of the logs window.

Constants.POPPLER_PATH¶

Path to poppler, an external framework for processing .pdf files.

Constants.PYTESSERACT_PATH¶

Path to tesseract, an external OCR engine for extracting data from images.
